data.text: @ghostinflatline Nah girl, they shouldn’t move unless he gets 2 negative test in a row, it’s just lack of communication between everyone. I got COVID and I made sure to had 2 negative test before going out again.

@ghostinflatline my grandma is literally the example of this. she felt so bad and got tested positive and for 4 days it’s like on rollercoaster, feeling bad then good, bad and good. just yesterday she felt great and today she got high fever again but she’s better again
@prisusxo me too! they def should’ve postponed every show this week the second they found out he had covid. definitely would’ve mad things less worrisome for a lot of people.

@ghostinflatline I thought the same thing cause they were all making their way.. :( I think they should’ve just postponed the whole week from the start and then announced the rescheduled dates when they could as it would’ve saved a lot of this mess & also gave him time to rest up and feel better
